snippet: Although Torres did not score, he got his first win over Atlético’s rival Real Madrid, an impressive 2-0 victory in the Copa del Rey.
abstract: Atletico Madrid defeats Real Madrid, 2-0; other soccer items noted.
lead_paragraph: Although Torres did not score, he got his first win over Atlético’s rival Real Madrid, an impressive 2-0 victory in the Copa del Rey.

headline.main: Fernando Torres Helps Atlético Madrid Top Real Madrid in First Leg of Matchup
headline.print_headline: Torres Helps Atlético Top Real in First Leg of Matchup
